titleStmt.title: The declaration votes, and order of assistance of both houses of Parliament, concerning the magazine at Hull, and Sir Iohn Hotham governour thereof. And His Majesties answer thereunto. With the statute of II H.7. cap. I. mentioned in the said answer. / Published together by His Majesties command..
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: The declaration votes, and order of assistance of both houses of Parliament, concerning the magazine at Hull, and Sir Iohn Hotham governour thereof. titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Title within border of printer's ornaments; title vignette, three objects, the central being a rose with crown above; initials, head-piece (to the Act).
"His Majesties answer" and the act "11 Hen.7, Cap. 1": p. 5-14 in black letter.
Imprint: LONDON: / Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to / the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by / the Assignes of John BIll. / MDCXLII.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
